attributes.action: Stop travel into/out of UK to prevent COVID-19 spreading more
attributes.additional_details: This shoud be acted upon immediately and not waited until it gets worse. If we start blocking it off now instead of waiting until it worsens (e.g. 80%) we can decrease the chance of more infected people coming into the UK and leaving the UK and spreading it further.
attributes.background: Close borders, stop flights into and out of the UK to prevent the chance of more infected people coming into/leaving the UK. People that have been/are going on holiday should be not allowed to enter/leave for an appropriate ammount of time and should be compensated for accomodation/ flights.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
